title: Walnut Wooden Keyboard Wrist Rest Vaydeer Ergonomic Gaming Desk Wrist Pad Support for 104 Key for Computer，Laptop Easy Typing Pain Relief Durable Comfortable,17.32inch
description: Color:Walnut Keyboard Wrist Rest 17.32 Inch1.Why choose us ? We are a professional timber processing factory having very strict requirements for every detail.At the same cost,we can make more exquisite products. 2.Why is the biggest difference between this product and the products of other merchants? A Slight slope design that carefully consider the needs of each customer. not a flat surface across the board, it ramps up gradually,ergonomic . Nursing Avoid impact and scratches Do not wash with water Avoid high temperature and overheating environment, exposure Avoid contact with chemicals or chemicals Features: 1.Safety and Environmental Protection Original wood quality without chemical odor, creating a fresh environment,let us devote ourselves to work and study 2.Well-designed The logs are carefully polished ,surface and edges of the wrist support are smooth,perfectly shaped for the uliimate comfort ,fell great for long typing , Silicone bottom provides heavy grip preventing sliding or unwanted movement，firmly to most desk surfaces including wood, glass, metal, and plastic 3.Fullsize dimensions suitable for standard 104 key mechanical keyboards,perfectly-sized 4.Strict packaging the package of wrist support is strict,six-sided parcel, thick pearl cotton protection 5.Office Essential improve hand and wrist posture, avoid joint and wrist problems and release your elbows and shoulder stress for long hours of use on the computer Specification Color:Natural Material:walnut Dimension:17*3*0.7inch/44*8*1.8cm Item weight:15.16oz/430gManufacturer: Shen zhen shi XUN LI （循力）ke ji you xian gong si
feature_bullets: 【Original Wood Quality】Log cutting, hand-polished, no odor, fading and deformation after a long time use
【Standard Size】17*3*0.7inch/44cm*8cm*1.8cm,Suitable for standard 104-key mechanical keyboard ergonomic,the edge has the lowest slope 0.55inch*/ 1.4cm, the highest point 0.7inch/1.8cm
【Non-slip Design】 The bottom silicone pad enhances the grip on the surface of the table, even during intense typing, it does not move, so that the wooden support is firmly fixed.
【Warm Remind】 Natural wood, each texture will be different, the color shade, white edges, knots and polished marks are not quality problems, thank you for your understanding and support
【Aftersale Guarantee】Strictly packed, six-sided parcel, thick pearl cotton protection .if you have any questions，please feel free to contact us and we will do our best to solve them.
